00009 goto_list_t *makelist (code_list_t *goto_node)
00010 {
00011    /* return a pointer to a new goto_list pointing at the code
00012       of the goto node. 
00013    */
00014    goto_list_t *result;
00015 
00016    result = (goto_list_t *) calloc (1, sizeof (goto_list_t));
00017    if (result == NULL)
00018    {
00019       perror ("unable to allocate memory in makelist()");
00020       return NULL;
00021    }
00022    result->labelptr = &(goto_node->code);
00023    result->next = NULL;
00024    return result;
00025 }
00026 
00027 goto_list_t *merge (goto_list_t *l1, goto_list_t *l2)
00028 {
00029    goto_list_t *head = l1;
00030 
00031    if (l1 == NULL)
00032       return l2;
00033    while (l1->next != NULL)
00034       l1 = l1->next;
00035    l1->next = l2;
00036    return head;
00037 }

00039 void backpatch (goto_list_t *goto_list, int label)
00040 {
00041    char *textptr = NULL,
00042         text [80];
00043 
00044    sprintf (text, "%04d\n", label);
00045    textptr = (char *)calloc (strlen (text) + 1, sizeof (char));
00046    if (textptr == NULL)
00047    {
00048       perror ("unable to allocate memory in backpatch");
00049       return;
00050    }
00051    strcpy (textptr, text);
00052    while (goto_list != NULL)
00053    {
00054       *(goto_list->labelptr) = textptr;
00055       goto_list = goto_list->next;
00056    }
00057 }
